sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comthdbmntrngloginfo ( data_sourc_nm , server_nm , dbms_knd , ceck_sql , mngr_nm , mngr_email_adres , mntrng_sttus , log_info , creat_dt , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , log_id ) VALUES ( #dataSourcNm# , #serverNm# , #dbmsKnd# , #ceckSql# , #mngrNm# , #mngrEmailAdres# , #mntrngSttus# , #logInfo# , #creatDt# , #frstRegisterId# , SYSDATE , #logId# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comthdbmntrngloginfo SET data_sourc_nm = #dataSourcNm# , server_nm = #serverNm# , dbms_knd = #dbmsKnd# , ceck_sql = #ceckSql# , mngr_nm = #mngrNm# , mngr_email_adres = #mngrEmailAdres# , mntrng_sttus = #mntrngSttus# , log_info = #logInfo# , creat_dt = #creatDt# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , log_id = #logId# WHERE 1 = 1 AND log_id = #logId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comthdbmntrngloginfo WHERE 1 = 1 AND log_id = #logId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT data_sourc_nm , server_nm , dbms_knd , ceck_sql , mngr_nm , mngr_email_adres , mntrng_sttus , log_info , creat_dt , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updt_pnttm , last_updusr_id , log_id FROM COMTHDBMNTRNGLOGINFO WHERE log_id = #logId#

SELECT A.DATA_SOURC_NM , A.SERVER_NM , A.DBMS_KND , A.CECK_SQL , A.MNGR_NM , A.MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES , A.MNTRNG_STTUS , A.LOG_INFO , A.CREAT_DT , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID , A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , A.LOG_ID FROM ( SELECT DATA_SOURC_NM , SERVER_NM , DBMS_KND , CECK_SQL , MNGR_NM , MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES , MNTRNG_STTUS , LOG_INFO , CREAT_DT , FRST_REGISTER_ID , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID , LOG_ID , ROWNUM FROM COMTHDBMNTRNGLOGINFO WHERE 1=1
DATA_SOURC_NM = #searchKeyword#
SERVER_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY LOG_ID DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTHDBMNTRNGLOGINFO WHERE 1=1
DATA_SOURC_NM = #searchKeyword#
SERVER_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
